firstImpression.title: A bit about me
firstImpression.box1Text: I see challenges as opportunities to learn and improve my skills.
firstImpression.box3Text: Focus on simple and intuitive solutions.
firstImpression.box4Text: Always learning to improve my skills and adapt to new trends.

iceBrakeSection.title: Variable Constants
iceBrakeSection.text:
The coffee can be mixed with milk, sugar, can be hot or iced, but in the end, it's still just coffee.
Like Kruceo, which adapts to different styles, but always keeps it's core essence.

presentPortfolioSection.text:

projects.title: Highlights
projects.text: We have several projects under constant development. These are just a few of them.
projects.item2Desc: A transaction manager for seafood products.
projects.item3Desc: A soccer points table style manager.

about.title: A Bit About Us
about.presentationText: The Kruceo is an organization under construction. We believe in a continuous growth process, and every day brings new opportunities to learn and innovate.
about.contactText: Feel free to reach out through any of our contact options.
about.item1Text: I am a passionate full-stack developer specializing in web and software development. With expertise in both frontend and backend technologies, I bring comprehensive solutions to every project.
about.item2Text: I leverage reactive technologies and modern styling approaches to deliver scalable and user-friendly applications.
about.item3Text: My development journey spans from initial concept to final implementation, ensuring a cohesive and high-quality outcome.

404.text: We have some problems with this page. If the problem persist, try contact with us.
